moves.1. Nf3 d5 2. Nh4: Bad move. You should never move the same piece twice in a row like that in an opening game.
moves.2... e5: Opening up a line of attack.
moves.3. Ng6: Not sure where that came from. She just gave up her knight for nothing.
moves.7... dxc3 8. Qe4: This is quite a huge mistake as you will see.
moves.8... Nxe4 9. dxc3 Qf6 10. Bc4: I think you can already tell that I have mate in 3.
